name: YETI

traits.name: Fear of Fire
traits.text: If the yeti takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two attacks, using Claw or Ice Throw in any combination.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Throw
actions.text: Ranged Attack Roll: +6, range 30/120 ft. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage.

actions.name: Chilling Gaze
actions.text: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the yeti can see within 30 feet. Failure: 5 (2d4) Cold damage, and the target has the Paralyzed condition until the start of the yeti's next turn unless the target has Immunity to Cold damage. Success: The target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.
